main.name: Shehan Prasanna
main.description: I am an open source enthusiast who is reading a degree in Management Information Systems at National School of Business Management.I mainly interested in Mobile development and Web development
main.bio: I am an enthusiastic and hardworking individual with a great passion for learning new things everyday.I really love challenges and and trying my best to achieve them is my nature.Being a Undergraduate in NSBM ,I am currently learning and  acquiring skills for becoming a Full Stack Developer in my career.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
